name: Strimazzle
description:
How to Play Strimazzle:

  1. Select two pieces to swap them
  2. The pieces proportions will change according to the shape
  3. Place all the pieces on their correct position to solve the puzzle
  4. Each help halves your score!
  5. You need to login to submit your score, get achievements or to duel someone!

I created this game using only javascript, without any library.
More than making a game I just wanted to test my skills :-)

In the last year I have played this game only me and my love, but maybe the time has come to make it public to everyone, considering that it is a fun little game!

If you find bugs or if you want to help me translate it into your language please leave me a comment.

Have fun!
